name: Polygonal
description:
Try escaping the polygonal world as a small, but fast projectile living inside a circle-shaped container.

There will be enemies in every room, but you have the ability to dodge them while in the container and charge at them once the projectile is out.

From the creators of Lilith's Will: https://toulouselautrec.itch.io/liliths-will

This is our first and simple take on the Roguelike genre.

Controls:

  • WASD while in the container.
  • Left-click to shoot the projectile.
  • Right-click to retrieve the projectile.
  • Mouse to move the projectile.

Music credits:

Driving to the Night by Frank Schröter
